issues.description: The constructor signature of Meal in the template repository has its parameters reversed compared to the problem specification (Meal(String, String[])) and the usage in Main. This will prevent students from compiling or following the intended design when calling new Meal("name", new String[]{...}).
issues.suggested_fix: Change the Meal constructor in the template to public Meal(String name, String[] ingredients) so that its parameter order matches the specification and the calls in Main.
